Short bio

  • Tenure-track Associate Professor
      Institute of Natural Science and School of Mathematical Sciences, Shanghai Jiao Tong University.

      School of Mathematical Sciences, Queen Mary University of London.

      GREYC, ENSICAEN and University of Caen Normandy.

      School of Mathematics & Institute of Natural Sciences, Shanghai Jiao Tong University.
